text: Gongguo bao jiang zhanxian chulai, suoyi, ni jiang hui kan dao zui renmen weiju qizhong de jilu. Tamen shuo:“Aya! Zhege gongguo bao zenme la, bulun dazui xiao zui, dou hao bu yilou, yiqie dou jiayi jilu.” Tamen jiang faxian ziji suo zuo de shi dou yiyi jilu zai benzi shang. Ni de zhu bu kui wang renhe ren
